features: Portable blackout curtain window shade, plus travel bag; blocks sunlight and UV rays, reduces outside noise, acts as an energy-saving insulating barrier, and ensures privacy
Made of 100% polyester fabric with Dark Gray; Velcro edges allow for customizing the dimensions of the curtain to fit various window sizes
Machine wash cold and line dry; do not bleach, iron, or dry clean
Smooth Glass affix to a window for easy installation; cannot be mounted to a curtain rod; be sure window is clean and Smooth Glass are dry before installation

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Blackout Curtain Window Shade Block out sunlight and harmful UV rays, reduce outside noise, and ensure privacy with this Amazon Basics portable travel blackout curtain shade. Energy Saving The blackout curtain shade also works well as an energy saving insulating barrier, keeping a room cooler in the summer and warmer in the winter. Suction Cups Suction cups affix easily to the window for secure placement. The window should be clean and suction cups dry before installing. Velcro Edges Velcro edges allow for customizing the dimensions of the blackout curtain window shade to fit various window sizes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Transforming Sleep Quality: Blackout Curtains
reviews.reviewText: In the quest for a restful and rejuvenating sleep, blackout curtains have emerged as a true game-changer. These innovative window treatments have the remarkable ability to transform any space into a haven of darkness, providing an optimal sleep environment that promotes better sleep quality. Here's why blackout curtains have proven to be an essential addition to my sleep routine and countless others seeking a restful night's sleep.Total Darkness for Deep Sleep:The standout feature of blackout curtains is their ability to create complete darkness in a room. By effectively blocking out external light sources, these curtains create an environment conducive to deep sleep. Whether it's early morning sunlight, streetlights, or ambient glare, blackout curtains ensure that your sleep remains undisturbed.Regulating Internal Temperature:Blackout curtains are not only effective at controlling light but also contribute to regulating the internal temperature of your sleeping space. These curtains offer an additional layer of insulation, helping to keep your room cooler in the summer and warmer in the winter. This temperature control further enhances sleep comfort and quality.Privacy and Comfort:Privacy is paramount for a serene sleep environment, and blackout curtains provide an excellent shield against prying eyes. They create a private sanctuary where you can unwind, relax, and disconnect from the outside world, ensuring maximum comfort and peace of mind.Ideal for Shift Workers:For those who work irregular hours or night shifts, blackout curtains are a godsend. They enable you to create a dark and tranquil sleeping environment regardless of the time of day, ensuring that your sleep quality remains unaffected by external factors.Promoting Melatonin Production:Complete darkness is essential for the body's production of melatonin, the sleep hormone. Blackout curtains facilitate the natural release of melatonin, allowing your body to follow its natural sleep-wake cycle and ensuring you wake up feeling refreshed and rejuvenated.Versatile Design and Aesthetics:Blackout curtains aren't just functional; they also come in a variety of styles, fabrics, and colors to suit your personal taste and interior decor. Whether you prefer a minimalist look or a more lavish aesthetic, there's a blackout curtain design that fits your space.Sound Sleep, Happy Life:The correlation between sleep quality and overall well-being is undeniable. By creating an environment that supports restful sleep, blackout curtains contribute to better mental health, improved focus, and increased daytime energy levels.Easy to Install and Maintain:Installing blackout curtains is a straightforward process that requires minimal effort. Once hung, they require little maintenance beyond occasional cleaning, making them a hassle-free addition to your home.In conclusion, blackout curtains are a sleep-enhancing solution that has transformed the way we approach rest. Their ability to block out light, regulate temperature, and create a private sanctuary contributes to a sleep environment that promotes deep, restorative slumber. Whether you're a light sleeper, a shift worker, or simply someone who values a good night's sleep, blackout curtains have the power to revolutionize your sleep experience. Investing in blackout curtains is an investment in your overall well-being and quality of life—one that pays off with each restful and rejuvenating morning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are GREAT!
reviews.reviewText: Blocks the light really, really well. There are so many suction cups and so many Velcro points available that it’s very easy to customize the fit to the window you are trying to block. The suction cups have very strong adhesion, none fell down in the 5 days we used the shades. Packs down easily into the supplied carrying case.Would 100% recommend to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for baby’s room
reviews.reviewText: We started using this in baby’s room when he was around three months old. These stuck like glue and made the room very dark. We have started gradually taking them down now that baby is older and it’s nice that they have been easy to put up and take down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to go on a trip with our young kid who is used to sleeping in dark, dark rooms. Overall, I cannot recommend this enough when traveling with little ones.PROS:It is quite dark material, it does a great job blocking out light.The suction cups are convenient and do a pretty decent job gripping (I would recommend cleaning the window before though, they stick better).The pattern is cute.Comes with a carry case and extra suction cups.Packs down pretty well, and doesn't take up a ton of space.The Velcro spots make it very easy to shrink the curtain without letting in tons light in the gaps.CONS:Some of the cups came squished, so it took a tiny bit to get them to flatten out and suction.If the window isn't cleaned totally well enough, the cups do fall off.This thing was such a great purchase we ended up putting it in our full sun bedroom window for the summer months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nocturnal is awesomeness in the dark!!!
reviews.reviewText: It's a great product to keep the room dark even if the sun is strong and bright. I love it allot!!! It's easy to install and it makes a huge difference. I recommend this to everyone who loves to sleep in the day time, it just works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for travel or home!
reviews.reviewText: These curtains have been a godsend for times we are traveling and need to block out light so our littles can sleep. The suction cups work great, the curtains fully block light. The only caution is if a window has a screen up top, you’ll have to get more creative with how to hang. We’ve even just tucked them into blinds bc it’s still 10x better to block most of the light rather than none. Also, the curtains actually fit back in the carrying case for easy storage. Definitely happy with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Completely block out light
reviews.reviewText: My wife and I bought these to block out the light in our basement for our baby. No light comes through. There are suction cups around the entire border. Quality product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Suction doesn’t stick well
reviews.reviewText: We have had these curtains for a couple years now, but this has been an issue since the beginning. They are great at blocking out the light, and we have used them on many trips and also in our rooms at night. The main issue is that the suction cups don’t stay up, so often we have to tape the curtains to the windows to get them to stay up.
Están buenísimas. Si obscurece el cuarto de mi bebe. Los chupones sirven muy bien.

Used this for a recent trip and then now using at home in our toddlers room. These worked great to create a nice dark space for our son sleeping at a VRBO and now we decided to use them at home also. Suction cups worked perfect on glass surface.

Purchased to put on the nursery windows behind the shutters. Very easy to set up and suction cups stick on the windows. Does not let sunlight in and is a better alternative then the paper blinds. It was also great that the blackout panel did not smell (like the paper blinds) when the sunlight hit. Works great for us and are portable too when traveling!

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to use, reasonably priced, full blackout!
reviews.reviewText: This product delivers everything it promises. It was extremely easy to put up, take down, and fold back for tidy storage in its bag. I wanted to test the suction cups as soon as the product arrived (I hadn’t cleaned the windows yet for a permanent placement), and they held the curtain firmly in place. The curtains provided a full blackout once they were placed on the window. I wish I bought this years ago!!! Highly recommend if you are looking for a reasonably priced, easy to use and full blackout solution for your place.

reviews.reviewTitle: They worked exactly like I needed them to
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these because I needed to darken my room from the downtown lights for my baby. I bought the two pack and they were larger than I expected. I have very large windows so I didn’t expect them to cover the entire window (see photo) but even so, they do a great job at darkening the room. For normal sized windows, they will be large enough. Great value for money. The suction is good. I find it stays better if I get them a bit wet before. Sometimes one comes off if I didn’t press hard enough but it’s an easy fix. Would recommend.
